item.description:
Stitches East is this coming weekend. It's 3 hours from Newington. If you're interested in a day trip and lots of yarn then this should be the perfect event.
List of Vendors

Lisa Souza, Miss Babs, Creatively Dyed, Holiday Yarns and Sanguine Gryphon will be there to name a few. Plus a lot of local yarn shops. The market opens at 10am Saturday and Sunday.

Let's plan to meet at the Barns & Nobel in Newington, at 8am. Which should get us there at 11am, time for some food and shopping and then heading back to NH around 3pm, arriving in Newington at 6pm.

Oh and don't forget a couple bucks gas money for the driver.

Connecticut Convention Center
100 Columbus Blvd
Hartford, CT 06103 USA
Phone: 860-249-6000
item.name: Stitches in Hartford!!! -Sunday!
